text: Senior student studying Computer Science and Information Engineering at National Taiwan University of Science and Technology. I have receive...
content:
Senior student studying Computer Science and Information Engineering at National Taiwan University of Science and Technology.

I have received an Academic Excellence Award for 4.22/4.3 GPA.

Besides the courseworks, I have experience working on various real-world software development projects. These include developing a web platform that managed a LineBot for a school administrative unit and a Pycharm plugin that streamlined assignment submissions to the schoolâ€™s Online Judge server.

In these projects, I collaborated with teams to design and develop software solutions, managed the database, implemented robust APIs, and created user-friendly interfaces. I am passionate about developing high-quality software solutions.

In addition, in my spare time, I enjoy developing open source tools and contributing to open source projects.

You can reach me via Linkedin or mirrorshih@gmail.com.
